name: Christmas Carols-Farm Karaoke
description:
Do you enjoy singing Christmas carols? You can't remember the words? Would you like to learn the lyrics in English, as well as in Spanish?

You'll love singing Christmas carols with our Karaoke app.

This app includes the following Christmas carols:

Free:

* Adeste fideles
* Twinkle, twinkle Chirstmas Star
* Away in a manger
* We wish you a merry Christmas
* Oh, Christmas tree
* Little drummer boy
* 25 de Diciembre, fun, fun, fun
* Ya viene la vieja


With the in-app purchase method, or upgrading your current app:

* Joy to the world
* The First Noel
* Silent Night
* 12 days of Christmas
* White Christmas
* Jingle bells
* El Burrito sabanero

Have a very Merry Christmas singing carols in the company of your closest friends and family!
